answers.answer: "I get blood test every 3 months to check myliver enzymes because of diabetes"What tests - ALT, AST? Was your Albumin checked too? Higher than normal AST & ALT indicates an enlarged or an injured liver, low Albumin can suggest liver disease. At times the doctor can feel an enlarged liver under the right rib cage. Also, a cirrhotic liver may feel firmer than usual. The single best test to check the health status of a liver is a liver biopsy.Considering this is the diabetes forum for better qualified answers on liver issues try posting on the Liver Disease forum.
